[!!!] Merge a hyperSpec object and a data frame

Merge a hyperSpec object and a data frame.

# S4 method for hyperSpec,data.frame
merge(x, y, ...)

Arguments

x

a hyperSpec object
y

a data.frame object
...

handed to merge.data.frame

Value

A hyperSpec object, with updated slot @data.

See also

merge, merge. collapse combines hyperSpec objects that do not share the wavelength axis. rbind, and cbind for combining hyperSpec objects that.

Examples


merge(chondro [1:10,, 600], chondro[5:15,, 600]$.., by = c("x", "y"))$.
#>       x     y clusters.x <NA> clusters.y
#> 1 -2.55 -4.77     lacuna   NA     lacuna
#> 2 -3.55 -4.77     lacuna   NA     lacuna
#> 3 -4.55 -4.77     lacuna   NA     lacuna
#> 4 -5.55 -4.77     lacuna   NA     lacuna
#> 5 -6.55 -4.77     matrix   NA     matrix
#> 6 -7.55 -4.77     matrix   NA     matrix
tmp <- merge (chondro [1:10,, 610], chondro [5:15,, 610]$..,
              by = c("x", "y"), all = TRUE)
tmp$.
#>         x     y clusters.x        610 clusters.y
#> 1  -11.55 -4.77     matrix 0.03572652       <NA>
#> 2  -10.55 -4.77     matrix 0.03538395       <NA>
#> 3   -9.55 -4.77     matrix 0.03421924       <NA>
#> 4   -8.55 -4.77     matrix 0.06429267       <NA>
#> 5   -7.55 -4.77     matrix 0.03318567     matrix
#> 6   -6.55 -4.77     matrix 0.06338616     matrix
#> 7   -5.55 -4.77     lacuna 0.02631364     lacuna
#> 8   -4.55 -4.77     lacuna 0.05297396     lacuna
#> 9   -3.55 -4.77     lacuna 0.02231205     lacuna
#> 10  -2.55 -4.77     lacuna 0.02625338     lacuna
#> 11  -1.55 -4.77       <NA>         NA     lacuna
#> 12  -0.55 -4.77       <NA>         NA     lacuna
#> 13   0.45 -4.77       <NA>         NA     lacuna
#> 14   1.45 -4.77       <NA>         NA     lacuna
#> 15   2.45 -4.77       <NA>         NA     lacuna
wl (tmp)
#> [1] 610

## remove duplicated wavelengths:
approxfun <- function (y, wl, new.wl){
  approx (wl, y, new.wl, method = "constant",
          ties = function (x) mean (x, na.rm = TRUE)
          )$y
}

merged <- merge (chondro [1:7,, 610 ~ 620], chondro [5:10,, 615 ~ 625], all = TRUE)
merged$.
#>        y      x clusters .nx .ny     spc.610     spc.614     spc.618
#> 1  -4.77 -11.55   matrix   1  NA 0.035726519 0.019315397 0.005847812
#> 2  -4.77 -10.55   matrix   2  NA 0.035383950 0.017850057 0.001127721
#> 3  -4.77  -9.55   matrix   3  NA 0.034219235 0.023651999 0.002247300
#> 4  -4.77  -8.55   matrix   4  NA 0.064292668 0.053033157 0.039095320
#> 5  -4.77  -7.55   matrix   5   1 0.033185665 0.022288895 0.007502747
#> 6  -4.77  -6.55   matrix   6   2 0.063386162 0.054046133 0.038441988
#> 7  -4.77  -5.55   lacuna   7   3 0.026313645 0.020229461 0.011212863
#> 8  -4.77  -4.55   lacuna  NA   4          NA          NA          NA
#> 9  -4.77  -3.55   lacuna  NA   5          NA          NA          NA
#> 10 -4.77  -2.55   lacuna  NA   6          NA          NA          NA
#>        spc.614     spc.618     spc.622     spc.626
#> 1           NA          NA          NA          NA
#> 2           NA          NA          NA          NA
#> 3           NA          NA          NA          NA
#> 4           NA          NA          NA          NA
#> 5  0.022288895 0.007502747 0.016177711 0.008470630
#> 6  0.054046133 0.038441988 0.040681397 0.041202231
#> 7  0.020229461 0.011212863 0.010838222 0.005669760
#> 8  0.044829596 0.035126075 0.033175597 0.030297464
#> 9  0.020100192 0.011917559 0.006782644 0.002454492
#> 10 0.021486812 0.013691807 0.008778219 0.003884944
merged <- apply (merged, 1, approxfun,
                 wl = wl (merged), new.wl = unique (wl (merged)),
                 new.wavelength = "new.wl")
merged$.
#>        y      x clusters .nx .ny     spc.610     spc.614     spc.618
#> 1  -4.77 -11.55   matrix   1  NA 0.035726519 0.019315397 0.005847812
#> 2  -4.77 -10.55   matrix   2  NA 0.035383950 0.017850057 0.001127721
#> 3  -4.77  -9.55   matrix   3  NA 0.034219235 0.023651999 0.002247300
#> 4  -4.77  -8.55   matrix   4  NA 0.064292668 0.053033157 0.039095320
#> 5  -4.77  -7.55   matrix   5   1 0.033185665 0.022288895 0.007502747
#> 6  -4.77  -6.55   matrix   6   2 0.063386162 0.054046133 0.038441988
#> 7  -4.77  -5.55   lacuna   7   3 0.026313645 0.020229461 0.011212863
#> 8  -4.77  -4.55   lacuna  NA   4          NA 0.044829596 0.035126075
#> 9  -4.77  -3.55   lacuna  NA   5          NA 0.020100192 0.011917559
#> 10 -4.77  -2.55   lacuna  NA   6          NA 0.021486812 0.013691807
